long_description: Active kids need eye protection too! The Pepper's Casper kids' sunglasses with polarized lenses are sized for smaller heads and guard against harmful rays of the sun. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Triacetate lens construction sandwiches a polyvinyl acetate layer between 2 outer acetate layers. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof polycarbonate frames are strong and acid- and heat-resistant. Gray camo frames feature polarized smoke gray lenses for neutral-tinted protection in bright, sunny conditions.
short_description: Active kids need eye protection too! The Pepper's Casper kids' sunglasses with polarized lenses are sized for smaller heads and guard against harmful rays of the sun.
